name: Eight Colour Hand Finished Screen Print. Rare "Artist Proofs" by Mark Lyken
description: Rare opportunity to own a New Eight Colour & Hand Finished Artist Proof by Mark Lyken. 420x420mm  on 310gsm Somerset. Signed by the Artist. CLICK TO DOWNLOAD LARGE IMAGE OF WORK LOW PRICE FUND RAISER for the Post Production costs of "Mirror Lands" a Mark Lyken & Emma Dove Film in production for Imagining Natural Scotland. Supported by Creative Scotland. www.imaginingnaturalscotland.org.uk Sales of these works coupled with last weeks auction will bring us to our Fund Raising Total. Mark Lyken is a Glasgow Based Visual Artist. www.lykenlove.com Emma Dove is a Glasgow Based Film Maker and Visual Artist. www.emmadovefilm.com
